comment._content: Claudia Carlstedt Wheeler was an actress in comic operas, known as "the girl in the red tights": www.ibdb.com/person.php?id=34551 She was married to Albert Gallatin Wheeler Jr.. In 1914, he sued her for divorce, and she was awarded alimony, but the divorce wasn't final before he ran off to Chicago. In 1922 she captured her estranged husband after a six-year chase, because he owed he about $20,000.
